front.title: PT-EAP: Posture Transport (PT) Protocol For EAP Tunnel Methods

abstract.t: This document specifies PT-EAP, a Posture Broker Protocol compatible with the Trusted Computing Group's IF-T Protocol Bindings for Tunneled EAP Methods (also known as EAP-TNC). The document then evaluates PT-EAP against the requirements defined in the NEA Requirements and PB-TNC specifications.
